short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to copy chat GPT responses with a click of a button or CMD+K and runs it through plagiarism detectors

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üìã Simple Buttons: Copy ChatGPT responses by just clicking on the "Copy" button. It's as easy as it gets!

‚å®Ô∏è Keyboard Shortcuts: Use CMD+K on Mac or CTRL+K  to copy ChatGPT responses

üö® Automatically runs copied text through plagiarism detectors such as GPTZero to check if the generated text gets flagged and warns you about it!

üêô 100% Open Source! The source code for CopyGPT is free and available on GitHub

‚ú® Get CopyGPT (Copy for ChatGPT) today to elevate your ChatGPT experience! ‚ú®

üêõ If you have any issues please report them at: https://copygpt.sethusenthil.com/issues 

üêõ Reporting there will help us get the information we need in order to fix the issue or bug! Thank you!

CopyGPT might break when ChatGPT updates their web application, I will try my best to keep it up to date but there might be a day or two when CopyGPT might not function as its supposed to. But I can assure you I will be working on a fix!
